"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5354282f6368723644530000#post_5354282f6368723644530000
Oh shit!

Trust me, these are BIG BRANDS in Taiwan. It is not the "Swastika" many are unfortunately familiar with. It's actually a Buddhist symbol.

Known as the _wan_ symbol in China. And _manji_ in Japan.
